about_the_game:
This DLC, for the game's enthusiasts, is an opportunity to see two great video clips styled after the ending of the Coven video game. The clips focus on two events after the Coven.
- Meeting Baphomet during Walpurgis Night
- Chelsea's dreams – what she saw in her sleep at the witch's house
You can also listen to all the key soundtracks from the game in the Media folder, which also contains a video file, "Coven", in mp4 format
Once again, please remember that the DLC is not a game. However, it has awesome footage. So the decision is up to you.
Story
Some time after the Coven, Chelsea turned into a witch. Shortly before Walpurgis Night, Baphomet comes to her
Chelsea! Chelsea...! You have to bring me an innocent soul for the upcoming Walpurgis Night. You haven't got much time to find it. Bring it to me or I'll take yours.
The easiest solution Chelsea found was inviting her girlfriend for a visit...
Musical themes
Folder: steamapps \ common \ Witch Halloween \ Media

Media\Jester.mp3

content_descriptors.notes: This game is for adults only. Sexual content is part of the game.

name: Witch Halloween - After party(+OST)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 5 512Vram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This DLC, for the game's enthusiasts, is an opportunity to see two great video clips styled after the ending of the Coven video game. The clips focus on two events after the Coven.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese
